title: Light grey slammed 11 window Double Door..

posts.content:
49barndoor wrote:
Mk1-17 wrote:
hey guys,

as far as I know, double doors are pretty rare.

In an auto museum in the usa, there is one (will contact on of my friends to know where exactly)

anybody has an idea of the number of how many splits where made with double doors on both sides ?


Pre 1955 barndoor era buses are rare as doubledoors, There are only 6 known in RHD and about 30 in LHD.

From 1955 to 1967 there are thousands of doubledoors out there.




Good luck with the sale Colin its a good asking price

Thanks mate, can always rely on your top notch knowledge
Your BD is perfection !!

Cheers Colin my BD DD is quite something but I don't think too many folk have Â£70k burning a hole in there pocket for a panel. Your DD on the other hand looks like a lot of bus at a very fair price. If someone steps up for my DD I will defo pop down for a cuppa and take this ride off your hands

No probs Ian, anytime, the right buyer will be there for your DD BD !
Mine is well priced, i am finished with the splits for a while, thats 15years i have had them now just fancy a change

Catch up soon mate
Hi. Is this still up for sale mate?

Hi Colin,
Mate can you or someone please tell me what colour this bus is?
Is there a VW colour code?
Cheers Matty
has this sold already > ? please msg me if not : )
sorry guys its sold, the colour is L345 Light Grey.

cassie27 wrote:
sorry guys its sold, the colour is L345 Light Grey.


appreciate the reply. cheers
